languages.text: "До последнего вздоха Немезит следовал уготованной ему стезе. Не будь он орудием искаженной воли, я бы признала в нем... достойного".
"Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."
languages.original_text: "До последнего вздоха Немезит следовал уготованной ему стезе. Не будь он орудием искаженной воли, я бы признала в нем... достойного".

traits.locale_text: "Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been a weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."
"Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been a weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."
"Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."
"Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."
"Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."
"Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."
"Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."

languages.text: "Nemesit war seinem Zweck bis zu seinem letzten Atemzug verschrieben. Wäre er nicht die Waffe eines kranken Willens gewesen, hätte ich ihn als würdig anerkannt."
languages.original_text: "Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."

traits.locale_text: "Nemesit war seinem Zweck bis zu seinem letzten Atemzug verschrieben. Wäre er nicht die Waffe eines kranken Willens gewesen, hätte ich ihn als würdig anerkannt."

languages.text: « Jusqu'à son dernier souffle, Némésite s'est dévoué corps et âme à son objectif. S'il n'avait pas été l'instrument d'un dessein contre nature, je l'aurais reconnu comme mon égal. »
languages.original_text: "Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."

traits.locale_text: « Jusqu'à son dernier souffle, Némésite s'est dévoué corps et âme à son objectif. S'il n'avait pas été l'instrument d'un dessein contre nature, je l'aurais reconnu comme mon égal. »

languages.text: «Nemesitio estuvo dedicado a su propósito hasta el fin. Si no hubiera sido el arma de una mente retorcida, le habría reconocido como digno».
languages.original_text: "Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."

traits.locale_text: «Nemesitio estuvo dedicado a su propósito hasta el fin. Si no hubiera sido el arma de una mente retorcida, le habría reconocido como digno».

languages.text: 「ネメサイトは息を引き取るまで、自身の目的に専念していたわ。彼が歪んだ意志の武器でなかったら、私は彼を立派な者として認めていたでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."

traits.locale_text: 「ネメサイトは息を引き取るまで、自身の目的に専念していたわ。彼が歪んだ意志の武器でなかったら、私は彼を立派な者として認めていたでしょう」

languages.text: “直到生命的最后一刻，涅墨斯特都在为自己的目标奋斗。如果他没有被扭曲的意志利用的话，我会认为他是个有价值的人。”
languages.original_text: "Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."

traits.locale_text: “直到生命的最后一刻，涅墨斯特都在为自己的目标奋斗。如果他没有被扭曲的意志利用的话，我会认为他是个有价值的人。”

languages.original_text: "Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."

languages.text: "Nemezit, son nefesine kadar gayesine sadık kaldı. Sapkın bir iradenin silahı olmasaydı onu saygın birisi olarak görebilirdim."
languages.original_text: "Until his last breath, Nemesite was dedicated to his purpose. Had he not been the weapon of a twisted will, I would have recognised him as worthy."
